sen.j: 馬屋古女王（うまやこのひめみこ、生没年不詳）は、聖徳太子と膳部菩岐々美郎女の第8子（第4王女）。
sen.e: Umaya no himemiko (date of birth and death unknown) was the eighth child (fourth princess) between Prince Shotoku and Kashiwadenominoiratsume.
Umaya no himemiko (date of birth and death unknown) was the eighth child (fourth princess) between Prince Shotoku and Kashiwadenominoiratsume.
Umaya no himemiko (date of birth and death unknown) was the eighth child (fourth princess) between Prince Shotoku and Kashiwadenominoiratsume.
Joguki (Record of the Crown Prince) was complied for Umaya no himemiko.
sen.cmt: 意味が不明。『上宮記』は馬屋女王のために作る、と解釈しました。
sen.e: "Joguki " (Record of the Crown Prince) was complied for Umaya no himemiko.
sen.cmt: ダブルクオートを付けました。
sen.e: "Joguki" (Record of the Crown Prince) was complied for Umaya no himemiko.
